le found this first qualitativo phase of the research to be quite interesting

Ke would like to present the findings of Phase I and the product of Phase II

Dear Carter:
The first phaso of the research progran being conducted in support of the
vIcenoy major creative exploratory has becn conpleted. Markcting and
Resenrch Counselors (warc) has finished Phase I of the research plan shich
a guidu for the subsequent conduct of a series of eighteen focus group
includcd a group of twelve in-depth interviews whieh helpod us to constrict
sessions in five cities: New Yerk, Chicago, Atlanta, Dallas, and San
Francisco.
The Ted Bates Creativo and Research Departments and the Gruun & rillianson
Accoumt Group obsurved msny of the focus group sessions and roviewed the
tape recordings of all of them. In pursuit of this creative exploratory.
Irv Sonn has marshaled the forces of our entiro Creative Departnent, te
rogret the inability of Brown & Killianson (nanagenent, brand group, and
research) to join us in observing sone of the focus group sessions.
le found this first qualitativo phase of the research to be quite interesting
and productivo. It confirnod soue hypotheses that we had fornod and pro-
vided positive direction for the development of ndvertising concepts
(Phase II of the rosearch plan) which are to be tested in the final quanti-
tative stage of the project; i.e. a national survey of i,ooo adult snokers.
findings from the focus group sessions about VIcERoY, vIClRay advertising

and auto racing. Ne wili also test the advertising concepts that have
been developed, guided by the research, as nost corpatihle with meeting

Ke would like to present the findings of Phase I and the product of Phase II
